/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -fopenmp -Wall -O3   -shared -Wl,-soname,libimagepyramidGPU.so -o lib/libimagepyramidGPU.so CMakeFiles/imagepyramidGPU.dir/src/imagepyramid/imagepyramidgpu.o -L/../shared/lib -L/usr/lib/nvidia-current -L/work/sdks/opencv-2.4.2/lib /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.so -lcuda -Wl,-rpath,/../shared/lib:/usr/lib/nvidia-current:/work/sdks/opencv-2.4.2/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib
